item.title: Suez Canal in the time of COVID-19
item.description: I doubt if any individual or industry on this planet is unaffected by the Coronavirus pandemic (hence a pandemic duh!). In this post I wanted to share some interesting facts I learned by following the news trail about oil prices. Let’s start with what happened to oil prices in April 2020. A little background on Oil trading is necessary to grasp the full picture, so here we go: Oil is traded on its future price.
